DOC.criteria: Leftover specimens subject already receive diagnosis receive treatment accordance standard care H & E glass coverslipped slide human tissue obtain via surgical pathology Selected slide fulfill quality check accord Instructions Use ( lfU ) Selected slide must 15 year since accession Selected slide FOVs must contain study feature : In 's natural environment ( slide FOV ) ; Readily observable ( slide FOV ) ; Not equivocal ( slide FOV ) . Selected slide contain indelible marking Selected slide contain damaged tissue More one slide select patient ( one slide may enrol per patient ) .
